formatting_rules: Start with a thought-provoking question or statement.
Use a single, impactful sentence that creates intrigue.
Leverage personal anecdotes or relatable experiences.
Incorporate subtle references to psychology or behavioral insights.
Conclude with a call-to-action that encourages the viewer to learn more.
emotional_triggers: Curiosity Gaps: Pose a mystery or unsolved problem that the viewer wants to unpack.
Inside Knowledge: Share a unique perspective or insider information that makes the viewer feel special.
Vulnerable Truth-Telling: Reveal a personal struggle or hidden struggle that the viewer can empathize with.
Psychological Insights: Provide a novel psychological framework or model that offers the viewer a new way of understanding themselves.
Aspirational Potential: Inspire the viewer to unlock their hidden potential or achieve a transformative goal.
